en.firstPara: Thank you for expressing interest in the Free Fast-Track MERN Stack Course! Before enrolling for this course you need to complete a small assignment:
en.secondPara: ЁЯУЭAssignment Follow this video https://youtu.be/L-HBR3cvxTY to build a basic react app with internationalization.
en.thirdPara: After completing this application share a GitHub repository link with me. Kindly submit this assignment before 8th December 2023.
en.fourthPara: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions. Let's make this learning experience exceptional together!
